Title: SRF (Send-Receive Files)
Description: SRF is a simple application. It was created to send and receive files. It's developed in C#(with use WPF and MVVM-pattern).
HomeWiki:
Project Description

 SRF is a simple application. It was created to send and receive files. It's developed in C# (with using WPF and MVVM-pattern).

For use SRF:

  • one user create the Server and send files;
  • other user create the Client and receive files;

 

*The project is temporarily suspended.
